main event: A civilian in Rockford, Michigan spotted a silverish-white, golf ball-sized object that was stationary in the sky in October 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 minutes.
The object was described as being the size of a golf ball at arm's length.
The object did not appear to be moving.
This was the second sighting of a similar object in the area that day, with the previous one traveling at around 50 knots.
The report concludes that the object was likely a balloon.
